channel.title: The Joe Rogan Experience
channel.itunes:summary: The podcast of Comedian Joe Rogan.
channel.itunes:author: Joe Rogan
channel.itunes:subtitle: Joe Rogan's Weekly Podcast

item.title: #824 - Bryan Callen
item.description: Bryan Callen is an actor and stand-up comedian, and together with Brendan Schaub he also hosts "The Fighter & The Kid" podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Bryan Callen is an actor and stand-up comedian, and together with Brendan Schaub he also hosts "The Fighter & The Kid" podcast.

item.title: #823 - Eleanor Kerrigan
item.description: Eleanor Kerrigan is a former waitress at The Comedy Store and is now a stand up performing all over the country.
item.itunes:subtitle: Eleanor Kerrigan is a former waitress at The Comedy Store and is now a stand up performing all over the country.

item.title: #822 - Chael Sonnen
item.description: Chael Sonnen is a retired mixed martial artist who last competed in the light heavyweight division of the UFC. He also hosts his own podcast called "You're Welcome with Chael Sonnen" available on iTunes.
item.itunes:subtitle: Chael Sonnen is a retired mixed martial artist who last competed in the light heavyweight division of the UFC. He also hosts his own podcast called "You're Welcome with Chael Sonnen" available on iTunes.

item.title: #821 & Fight Companion - Joey Diaz
item.description: Joe is joined by Joey Diaz to watch the fights on July 7, 2016. http://joeydiaz.net http://podcasts.joerogan.net
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe is joined by Joey Diaz to watch the fights on July 7, 2016. http://joeydiaz.net http://podcasts.joerogan.net

item.title: #820 - Milo Yiannopoulos
item.description: Milo Yiannopoulos is a writer and broadcaster. He is a senior editor at Breitbart.com and hosts "The Milo Yiannopoulos Show" podcast available on iTunes.
item.itunes:subtitle: Milo Yiannopoulos is a writer and broadcaster. He is a senior editor at Breitbart.com and hosts "The Milo Yiannopoulos Show" podcast available on iTunes.

item.title: #819 - Brendan Schaub
item.description: Brendan Schaub is a mixed martial artist and also a former college & pro football player. He also hosts a podcast with Bryan Callen called "The Fighter & The Kid" available on iTunes.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brendan Schaub is a mixed martial artist and also a former college & pro football player. He also hosts a podcast with Bryan Callen called "The Fighter & The Kid" available on iTunes.

item.title: #818 - Mike Schmidt
item.description: Before becoming a door guy at The Comedy Store, Mike Schmidt worked for over 10 years as a criminal defense attorney in Wisconsin.
item.itunes:subtitle: Before becoming a door guy at The Comedy Store, Mike Schmidt worked for over 10 years as a criminal defense attorney in Wisconsin.

item.title: #817 - Jason Hairston & Brendan Burns
item.description: Jason Hairston is a former NFL player and founder of KUIU, an "Ultralight Mountain Hunting Gear" company. Brendan Burns is an accomplished mountain hunter and manages KUIU Professional Services.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jason Hairston is a former NFL player and founder of KUIU, an "Ultralight Mountain Hunting Gear" company. Brendan Burns is an accomplished mountain hunter and manages KUIU Professional Services.

item.title: #816 - Joe Schilling
item.description: Joe Schilling is an American Muay Thai kickboxer and MMA fighter who competes in the super middleweight and light heavyweight and the Middleweight division of Bellator MMA.
item.itunes:subtitle: Joe Schilling is an American Muay Thai kickboxer and MMA fighter who competes in the super middleweight and light heavyweight and the Middleweight division of Bellator MMA.

item.itunes:subtitle: Ari Shaffir is a stand-up comedian and also hosts the podcasts Ari Shaffirâs Skeptic Tank & Punch Drunk Sports. Check out his show This Is Not Happening on Comedy Central & YouTube.

item.title: #813 - Shane Dorian
item.description: Shane Dorian is a big wave surfer and bowhunter.
item.itunes:subtitle: Shane Dorian is a big wave surfer and bowhunter.

item.title: #812 - Russell Brand & Jim Breuer
item.description: Russell Brand is an English comedian, actor, radio host, author, and activist. Jim Breuer is a stand up comedian, actor, author, singer and host.
item.itunes:subtitle: Russell Brand is an English comedian, actor, radio host, author, and activist. Jim Breuer is a stand up comedian, actor, author, singer and host.

item.title: #811 - Jim Breuer
item.description: Jim Breuer is a stand up comedian, actor, author, singer and host. Check out his podcast The Metal In Me and his new rock album "Songs From the Garage" available on iTunes now.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jim Breuer is a stand up comedian, actor, author, singer and host. Check out his podcast The Metal In Me and his new rock album "Songs From the Garage" available on iTunes now.

item.title: #810 - Big Jay Oakerson
item.description: Big Jay Oakerson is a stand up comedian and he also hosts his own show "Legion of Skanks Podcast" available on iTunes. His new one-hour special "Live at Webster Hall" premieres Friday June 17th at midnight on Comedy Central. http://bigjaycomedy.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Big Jay Oakerson is a stand up comedian and he also hosts his own show "Legion of Skanks Podcast" available on iTunes. His new one-hour special "Live at Webster Hall" premieres Friday June 17th at midnight on Comedy Central. http://bigjaycomedy.com

item.title: #809 - Aubrey Marcus
item.description: Aubrey Marcus is writer, entrepreneur, and adventurer. He also hosts his own podcast available for download via iTunes called The Aubrey Marcus Podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Aubrey Marcus is writer, entrepreneur, and adventurer. He also hosts his own podcast available for download via iTunes called The Aubrey Marcus Podcast.

item.title: #808 - Michael Wood, Jr.
item.description: Michael A. Wood, Jr. is a retired Baltimore police officer and veteran of the USMC. He previously made the news for publicly speaking out against police brutality and has become a proponent of a new era of policing. A young man who met Michael as a child, when Michael was a cop volunteering a recreation center, found Michael to talk about how much the experience affected him as well. He's now trying to continue his growth, please help him here: http:///gofundme.com/domstrip2cuba

item.title: #806 - Dave Smith
item.description: Dave Smith is a stand up comedian & host of Part Of The Problem podcast available on iTunes, and he is also one-third of The Legion of Skanks.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dave Smith is a stand up comedian & host of Part Of The Problem podcast available on iTunes, and he is also one-third of The Legion of Skanks.

item.title: #805 - Steve Hofstetter
item.description: Steve Hofstetter is a comedian and podcast host. His podcast "Major League" is available on iTunes & he also has a YouTube channel with over 35 million views -- https://www.youtube.com/stevehofstetter

item.title: #804 - Sam Harris
item.description: Sam Harris is a neuroscientist and author of the New York Times bestsellers, The End of Faith, Letter to a Christian Nation, and The Moral Landscape. His podcast called "Waking Up" is available on iTunes & Stitcher.
item.itunes:subtitle: Sam Harris is a neuroscientist and author of the New York Times bestsellers, The End of Faith, Letter to a Christian Nation, and The Moral Landscape. His podcast called "Waking Up" is available on iTunes & Stitcher.

item.title: #801 - Gary Johnson
item.description: Gary Johnson is the Honorary Chairman of the Our America Initiative, two-term Governor of New Mexico, and 2016 Libertarian candidate for President.
item.itunes:subtitle: Gary Johnson is the Honorary Chairman of the Our America Initiative, two-term Governor of New Mexico, and 2016 Libertarian candidate for President.

item.title: #800 - Bobcat Goldthwait
item.description: Bobcat Goldthwait is an actor, comedian, and filmmaker. His latest movie called "Willow Creek" is a found footage horror film involving bigfoot evidence.
item.itunes:subtitle: Bobcat Goldthwait is an actor, comedian, and filmmaker. His latest movie called "Willow Creek" is a found footage horror film involving bigfoot evidence.
